room_title: Escape room "Pharaohs Tomb: Anubis' Wrath" by Escape Rooms Portland Michigan in Lansing
room_description: While exploring the tombs of the Pharaohs, you and your team of archaeologists have accidentally triggered the ancient Egyptian summoning ritual of Anubis, God of the underworld. Anubis is now on his way and will take any soul, living or dead, back with him to the underworld. Your only hope of surviving is to stop the ritual and get out before Anubis arrives.
